info: Withdrawal is processed via Polymarket Relayer (gasless). The transaction will be submitted immediately but may take a few minutes to confirm on-chain.
submitted: Withdrawal request submitted successfully. You can track the transaction status on PolygonScan.
title: Withdraw
walletActivating: Your wallet needs to be activated before withdrawal. The activation and withdrawal will be processed automatically. This may take a few minutes. You can check the wallet address on PolygonScan to monitor progress.
